translated: the best of friends are not separated.

original: byis pa'i dus na ri bong dang bral ba //
analyzed: byis pa'i dus na ri bong dang bral ba //
translated: In childhood, the rabbit was separated from the deer;

original: cung zad dus na dro min 'od zer 'byung //üîΩri bong rnam pa des ni brgya lam na //
analyzed: cung zad dus na dro min 'od zer 'byung // ri bong rnam pa des ni brgya lam na //
translated: after a time, the sun‚Äôs rays are not cool.üîΩThe rabbit, in that way, is not a friend

original: brtul zhugs can des legs par byas pa min //
analyzed: brtul zhugs can des legs par byas pa min //
translated: of the ascetic, who has acted well.

original: gom pa bdun du dor ba'i grogs bshes nyid yin te //
analyzed: gom pa bdun du dor ba'i grogs bshes nyid yin te //
translated: He is a friend who has gone seven steps with him;

original: rang bzhin gyis dag sems ldan dam pa rnams la ni //üîΩphan tshun yon tan gtam gyis yid ni ches gyur pa'i //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis dag sems ldan dam pa rnams la ni // phan tshun yon tan gtam gyis yid ni ches gyur pa'i //
translated: but the good, who are pure in mind by nature,

original: nges par 'brel pa'i bsam ldan rnams la smos ci dgos //
analyzed: nges par 'brel pa'i bsam ldan rnams la smos ci dgos //
translated: what need is there to speak of those who are bound togetherüîΩby the conversation of mutual virtues?

original: skyes pa ting 'dzin gnas pa rnams kyi blo la ni //
analyzed: skyes pa ting 'dzin gnas pa rnams kyi blo la ni //
translated: But in the minds of those who are born in the state of concentration

original: chos kyi don du gsal ba nyid ni 'byung ba ste //
analyzed: chos kyi don du gsal ba nyid ni 'byung ba ste //
translated: The clarity of the Dharma meaning arises.

original: rab tu yang ba'i yid ldan dud 'gro rnams la ni //
analyzed: rab tu yang ba'i yid ldan dud 'gro rnams la ni //
translated: But how is it that animals, who have very light minds,

original: chos la rtsom pa'i 'du shes ci phyir gyur pa yin //
analyzed: chos la rtsom pa'i 'du shes ci phyir gyur pa yin //
translated: Have the idea of beginning the Dharma?

original: kye ma ri bong skyes pa 'di ni gang du skye //
analyzed: kye ma ri bong skyes pa 'di ni gang du skye //
translated: Alas, where was this rabbit born?

original: gang du tshig brtan 'di ni zhi ba 'di gang du //
analyzed: gang du tshig brtan 'di ni zhi ba 'di gang du //
translated: Where is this one who is steadfast in peace?

original: 'di ltar lha rnams la ni byung bar gyur pa yin //
analyzed: 'di ltar lha rnams la ni byung bar gyur pa yin //
translated: In this way, it has arisen among the gods.

original: ri bong nyid la ngo mtshar ba dang bcas pa'i sems //
analyzed: ri bong nyid la ngo mtshar ba dang bcas pa'i sems //
translated: The rabbit has a mind full of wonder.

original: de nas dus nam zhig na chu med pa nyid kyis kun skya ba dang phrag dog dang bcas pa'i zhing ba'i skye bo rnams kyis mthong bar gyur pa dang / glog gi rgyun gyi sgeg pa rnam par zlog pa dang / rlung gi stobs kyi tshogs rnam par chad pa'i sprin gyi tshogs yod pa la nyin mor byed pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis bskams pa'i chu lhag ma dang bcas pa dang /
analyzed: de nas dus nam zhig na chu med pa nyid kyis kun skya ba dang phrag dog dang bcas pa'i zhing ba'i skye bo rnams kyis mthong bar gyur pa dang / glog gi rgyun gyi sgeg pa rnam par zlog pa dang / rlung gi stobs kyi tshogs rnam par chad pa'i sprin gyi tshogs yod pa la nyin mor byed pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis bskams pa'i chu lhag ma dang bcas pa dang /
translated: were dispersed by the force of the wind. The remaining water, which had been dried up by the sun‚Äôs rays,üîΩwas covered with light grain, whose essence had become spoiled.üîΩThe river, which had been filled with water that had been cut off by the rain,

original: snying po yongs @17b su rnyings pas yang ba'i lo tog rnams kyis bkab pa'i zhing rnams yod pa la lan cig chu rnam par chad pas rab tu gram pa'i chus rnam par grol ba shin tu rgya che ba'i chu'i 'gram na chag pa dang / gan rkyal du nya phyis gnas pa'i chu bo rnams yod pa dang /
analyzed: snying po yongs @17b su rnyings pas yang ba'i lo tog rnams kyis bkab pa'i zhing rnams yod pa la lan cig chu rnam par chad pas rab tu gram pa'i chus rnam par grol ba shin tu rgya che ba'i chu'i 'gram na chag pa dang / gan rkyal du nya phyis gnas pa'i chu bo rnams yod pa dang /
translated: was now freed from the water that had been scattered by the wind.

original: rdul babs bas rdul gyis ma nus pa'i rnam par 'brel ba'i dbugs kyis rab tu bskyod pa'i mgrin pa dang ldan pa myos pa'i dus la yang gar gyi bya ba rnam par bzlog pa'i mgrin pa sngon po can rnams yod pa la dma' bar skyes pa'i rtsva sar
analyzed: rdul babs bas rdul gyis ma nus pa'i rnam par 'brel ba'i dbugs kyis rab tu bskyod pa'i mgrin pa dang ldan pa myos pa'i dus la yang gar gyi bya ba rnam par bzlog pa'i mgrin pa sngon po can rnams yod pa la dma' bar skyes pa'i rtsva sar
translated: They had necks that were shaken by the breath that was connected with the dust that was unable to be shaken off by the falling dust. They had blue necks that were turned away from the activity of dancing even at the time of intoxication.

original: pa'i myu gu bskams pas sa la rtsva za ba ma rnyed pa nyid kyis kun nas dkris pa'i lto ba dang ldan pa dal gyis 'gro bas bskyod pa dang lkog shal 'phyang zhing lhod pa can 'o ma zad pas nu 'bur chung ba /
analyzed: pa'i myu gu bskams pas sa la rtsva za ba ma rnyed pa nyid kyis kun nas dkris pa'i lto ba dang ldan pa dal gyis 'gro bas bskyod pa dang lkog shal 'phyang zhing lhod pa can 'o ma zad pas nu 'bur chung ba /
translated: They had bellies that were completely wrapped with the grass that was born low, because they did not find grass to eat on the ground that was dried up by the sprouts of the grass. They had slow-moving, hanging dewlaps. They had small udders because their milk was exhausted.

original: kun nas stobs chung ba'i ba be'u dang ldan pa yod pa'i dus na /
analyzed: kun nas stobs chung ba'i ba be'u dang ldan pa yod pa'i dus na /
translated: They had calves that were completely weak.

original: sngo dang 'dra ba'i nas ngan pa 'tshal bas rid pa dang rtsub pa'i yan lag can dbul po'i skye bo yod pa na /
analyzed: sngo dang 'dra ba'i nas ngan pa 'tshal bas rid pa dang rtsub pa'i yan lag can dbul po'i skye bo yod pa na /
translated: At that time, there were poor people who were thin from eating bad barley that was like grass. They had rough limbs.

original: mu ge'i skyon gyis don du gnyer ba la bkur sti rgyab tu phyogs par byas pa'i grong dang ldan pa /
analyzed: mu ge'i skyon gyis don du gnyer ba la bkur sti rgyab tu phyogs par byas pa'i grong dang ldan pa /
translated: The fault of famine turned the people of the town away from the respect they had for the one they sought to help.

original: skabs skabs su bsgrub pa'i sgra thos bzhin pa'i ba glang gi ra ba rnams yod pa'i dus su /
analyzed: skabs skabs su bsgrub pa'i sgra thos bzhin pa'i ba glang gi ra ba rnams yod pa'i dus su /
translated: The town was filled with cowpens, where the sound of the cows being milked could be heard from time to time, and where the people, because of the famine, turned their backs on the practice of showing respect to those in need.

original: dka' thub pa des ri bong de la kye ma phan par byas pa la yang phongs pa'i dus su rang bzhin gyis dman pa'i srog chags rjes su 'jug pa ma yin te zhes bya ba smras so //
analyzed: dka' thub pa des ri bong de la kye ma phan par byas pa la yang phongs pa'i dus su rang bzhin gyis dman pa'i srog chags rjes su 'jug pa ma yin te zhes bya ba smras so //
translated: At that time, the ascetic said to the rabbit, ‚ÄúAlas! Even when one is trying to help, in a time of need, a creature of inferior nature does not follow. ‚Äù

original: khyod kyis blta bar gyis shig gang gi phyir 'di ni //üîΩchu rgyun 'bab pas rnam 'byed zla ba'i nor bu can gyi sgro tshogs dga' bas rgyas byed cing //
analyzed: khyod kyis blta bar gyis shig gang gi phyir 'di ni // chu rgyun 'bab pas rnam 'byed zla ba'i nor bu can gyi sgro tshogs dga' bas rgyas byed cing //
translated: ‚ÄúLook!üîΩThe rain-bearing cloud, which is like a peacock,üîΩwith its rain-bearing water flowing, its tail feathers spread in joy,

original: gar gyis sgeg par ldan pa sngon du rnam bsams skad kyis gang zhig la ni bstod bzhin pa //
analyzed: gar gyis sgeg par ldan pa sngon du rnam bsams skad kyis gang zhig la ni bstod bzhin pa //
translated: dancing gracefully, and praised by the sound of thunder,

original: rma bya chu med pa yi sprin de nyid la mig gnyis blta ba la ni le lo can //
analyzed: rma bya chu med pa yi sprin de nyid la mig gnyis blta ba la ni le lo can //
translated: is lazy in looking at the two eyes of the rainless peacock.

original: phal char skal ba dang ldan nyid la rang gi don la mkhas pa'i skye bo rten par byed //
analyzed: phal char skal ba dang ldan nyid la rang gi don la mkhas pa'i skye bo rten par byed //
translated: and it is the fortunate who are the support of the wise in their own affairs.

original: chu dang bral ba'i chu 'dzin rnams ni so sor 'gyur te dbang po'i gzhu ni rnam par chad //
analyzed: chu dang bral ba'i chu 'dzin rnams ni so sor 'gyur te dbang po'i gzhu ni rnam par chad //
translated: The clouds, deprived of water, are dispersed, and the bow of Indra is broken to pieces.

original: ri yi phug rnams dang ni 'brel pas zab mo'i tshig rnams rma bya rnams kyis thos min te //
analyzed: ri yi phug rnams dang ni 'brel pas zab mo'i tshig rnams rma bya rnams kyis thos min te //
translated: The peacocks no longer listen to the deep notes of the thunder in the mountain caves.

original: dngos po thams cad rang bzhin gyis ni 'jig ces bsams bzhin mya ngan gyis ni yun ring por //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad rang bzhin gyis ni 'jig ces bsams bzhin mya ngan gyis ni yun ring por //
translated: All things perish by their very nature: thus reflecting, I have long been filled with sorrow.

original: glog gi gar mkhan mas ni 'jam ba'i sgeg pas gar byed pa yang yongs su dor bar byed //
analyzed: glog gi gar mkhan mas ni 'jam ba'i sgeg pas gar byed pa yang yongs su dor bar byed //
translated: The lightning, that wanton dancer, has abandoned her graceful movements.

original: 'bras bu can gyi shing gi @18a * //üîΩnags ni 'bras zad 'gyur te ljon shing rnams ni skam par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'bras bu can gyi shing gi @18a * // nags ni 'bras zad 'gyur te ljon shing rnams ni skam par 'gyur //
translated: The forest of the Kalpavriksha treesüîΩis dried up, the trees have lost their fruit.

original: rim gyis padma'i rtsa ba rnams ni rnyings pas padma'i rtsa ba'i 'dab ni sra 'gyur ba //
analyzed: rim gyis padma'i rtsa ba rnams ni rnyings pas padma'i rtsa ba'i 'dab ni sra 'gyur ba //
translated: The lotus leaves, withered by the frost, are now hard and stiff.

original: 'dir ni bdag gi shing lo'i khang par gang zhig rgya shug dang ni ae gu dhi 'bras tshogs //
analyzed: 'dir ni bdag gi shing lo'i khang par gang zhig rgya shug dang ni ae gu dhi 'bras tshogs //
translated: Here, in my leaf-hut, I have a store of jujubes and egudhi fruit.

original: de yang zad de shin tu bya dka'i dka' thub don du ltad mo ci ltar byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: de yang zad de shin tu bya dka'i dka' thub don du ltad mo ci ltar byed par 'gyur //
translated: Here, in my leaf-hut, what will I do for entertainment, when my supply of jujube and egudhi fruit is exhausted?üîΩAnd that too is exhausted.

original: kha zas med pas skad cig re rer lus po 'di ni nus pa med par 'gro ba ste //
analyzed: kha zas med pas skad cig re rer lus po 'di ni nus pa med par 'gro ba ste //
translated: Without food, this body of mine becomes weaker and weaker with every passing moment.

original: nus pa med pas rnal 'byor rnams kyi sems la rab tu 'joms phyir ting 'dzin ga la brtan //
analyzed: nus pa med pas rnal 'byor rnams kyi sems la rab tu 'joms phyir ting 'dzin ga la brtan //
translated: And because of its weakness, how can concentration be stable, since it destroys the mind of the yogi?

original: ting 'dzin dman pa'i yid can shes rab can yang de nyid mngon du phyogs par ci phyir 'gyur //
analyzed: ting 'dzin dman pa'i yid can shes rab can yang de nyid mngon du phyogs par ci phyir 'gyur //
translated: And how can one with inferior concentration have wisdom, since it is directed towards reality?

original: de nyid ma mthong bas kyang gti mug rab rib bcings pa phyis ni don med ngal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de nyid ma mthong bas kyang gti mug rab rib bcings pa phyis ni don med ngal bar 'gyur //
translated: And even if one does not see reality, one is bound by the darkness of delusion, and later one will be exhausted for no purpose.

original: de phyir pags pa'i spyi'u blugs shing shun gos rnams dor byas nas //
analyzed: de phyir pags pa'i spyi'u blugs shing shun gos rnams dor byas nas //
translated: Therefore, having removed the skin and the bark,

original: rang gi khyim du gnyen 'dun skye bo lhan cig gnas par bgyi //
analyzed: rang gi khyim du gnyen 'dun skye bo lhan cig gnas par bgyi //
translated: I will live in my house together with my relatives and friends.

original: mu ge'i skyon las thal bar gyur nas slar ni nags nang du //
analyzed: mu ge'i skyon las thal bar gyur nas slar ni nags nang du //
translated: Having escaped from the danger of famine, we will return to the forest.

original: byams pa 'dir ni khyod dang lhan cig yun rings gnas par bgyi //
analyzed: byams pa 'dir ni khyod dang lhan cig yun rings gnas par bgyi //
translated: Here, in this place, we will stay for a long time with you, O Maitreya.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' yun ring por lhan cig tu gnas pas mngon par 'phel ba'i gnyen bzhin pas brlan pa'i snying gtam drang srong de la smras pa /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' yun ring por lhan cig tu gnas pas mngon par 'phel ba'i gnyen bzhin pas brlan pa'i snying gtam drang srong de la smras pa /
translated: Then the Bodhisattva, like a friend whose affection has grown through long association, spoke to the sage with a heart moistened with affection:

original: 'ching ba'i sdong po bton nas bde ba mngon 'dod cing //
analyzed: 'ching ba'i sdong po bton nas bde ba mngon 'dod cing //
translated: Having pulled out the root of the tree of bondage, desiring happiness,

original: rnam pa gang gis mche gnyis pa ni nags mthar song //
analyzed: rnam pa gang gis mche gnyis pa ni nags mthar song //
translated: in what way did the two-tusked one go to the end of the forest?

original: slar ni lcags kyu 'debs pa'i sdug bsngal ma dran pas //
analyzed: slar ni lcags kyu 'debs pa'i sdug bsngal ma dran pas //
translated: Not remembering the suffering of being caught by the hook,

original: mi shes pa ni skye bo'i nang nyid 'gro bar 'dod //
analyzed: mi shes pa ni skye bo'i nang nyid 'gro bar 'dod //
translated: the ignorant one wishes to go back among people.

original: zhi dang shes rab nyid dang dka' thub yon tan dang // shes bya la ni ji bzhin rjes 'gro'i thos pas kyang //
analyzed: zhi dang shes rab nyid dang dka' thub yon tan dang // shes bya la ni ji bzhin rjes 'gro'i thos pas kyang //
translated: By the qualities of tranquility, wisdom, and asceticism, and by the learning that properly follows the objects of knowledge,

original: khyod ni thub pa gzhan rnams zil gyis mnan nas gnas //
analyzed: khyod ni thub pa gzhan rnams zil gyis mnan nas gnas //
translated: you remain, outshining the other sages.

original: nyi mas mar me bzhin du ring ba'i 'od zer gyis //
analyzed: nyi mas mar me bzhin du ring ba'i 'od zer gyis //
translated: Like the sun, with its far-reaching rays, outshines the glowworm,

original: mun pa med pa'i rnam par dben pa'i mig gis ni //
analyzed: mun pa med pa'i rnam par dben pa'i mig gis ni //
translated: With eyes that are not blinded by darkness,

original: de ltar khyod kyi bstan bcos nges par yang ni mthong //
analyzed: de ltar khyod kyi bstan bcos nges par yang ni mthong //
translated: I have seen your treatise in this way.

original: spyod yul las 'das yul la rab tu zhugs 'dod pa //
analyzed: spyod yul las 'das yul la rab tu zhugs 'dod pa //
translated: You who wish to enter the realm beyond the sphere of activity,

original: ji ltar bag med byed bzhin zhes bya mtshon pa yin //
analyzed: ji ltar bag med byed bzhin zhes bya mtshon pa yin //
translated: You are like one who says, ‚ÄúI am not heedless.‚Äù

original: mun pa rnam par 'byed cing ji ltar gsal byed pa //
analyzed: mun pa rnam par 'byed cing ji ltar gsal byed pa //
translated: You who illuminate the darkness and shine like a lamp,

original: lus can rnams la yid ni dang ba bskyed pa ste //
analyzed: lus can rnams la yid ni dang ba bskyed pa ste //
translated: You who inspire faith in embodied beings,

original: rmongs pas mkhas pa rnams kyi legs bshad mi shes pas //
analyzed: rmongs pas mkhas pa rnams kyi legs bshad mi shes pas //
translated: You who do not understand the good advice of the wise because of delusion,

original: dmus long za ba'i dkyil 'khor @18b gsal bar byed pa bzhin //
analyzed: dmus long za ba'i dkyil 'khor @18b gsal bar byed pa bzhin //
translated: You are like one who illuminates the mandala of the blind.

original: legs par blo yi mar me med pas dka' thub ma //
analyzed: legs par blo yi mar me med pas dka' thub ma //
translated: You who are without the lamp of the mind, you who are without asceticism,

original: bde ba rjes chags 'dor byed ces bya gtam gang yin //
analyzed: bde ba rjes chags 'dor byed ces bya gtam gang yin //
translated: You who are said to abandon attachment to pleasure,

original: khyim pa nyid la gang zhig yid ni dga' byed pa //
analyzed: khyim pa nyid la gang zhig yid ni dga' byed pa //
translated: You who delight the mind in the very household,

original: rnam par dag pa'i bsam ldan de ni che mi rigs //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i bsam ldan de ni che mi rigs //
translated: You who are endowed with pure thoughts, you are not a great one.

original: thun gsum du ni mar gyi sreg blugs dris bsgos pa'i //
analyzed: thun gsum du ni mar gyi sreg blugs dris bsgos pa'i //
translated: You who offer three times a day oblations of clarified butter perfumed with incense,

original: rgya shug dang ni aem gu dhi 'bras nang zhugs pa //
analyzed: rgya shug dang ni aem gu dhi 'bras nang zhugs pa //
translated: The Amra fruit and the jujube tree are in the water.

original: chu la brten pa'i ngang skya dang ni sa ra sas //
analyzed: chu la brten pa'i ngang skya dang ni sa ra sas //
translated: The lotus and the sarasa plant are in the water.

original: zhing la nye bar sbas pa'i shing lo'i khang pas brgyan //
analyzed: zhing la nye bar sbas pa'i shing lo'i khang pas brgyan //
translated: The field is adorned with a leaf-hut hidden nearby.

original: dka' thub can gyi bu mos blugs pa'i bum chu yis //
analyzed: dka' thub can gyi bu mos blugs pa'i bum chu yis //
translated: The water-pot filled by the ascetic's daughter

original: rab tu gtor zhing 'byung ba'i shing ni chung ba rnams //
analyzed: rab tu gtor zhing 'byung ba'i shing ni chung ba rnams //
translated: is sprinkled well, and the small trees

original: 'gram du shing gi grib mas chu rnams 'gag pa ni //
analyzed: 'gram du shing gi grib mas chu rnams 'gag pa ni //
translated: are stopped by the shade of the trees on the bank.

original: kun nas dbugs 'byung me tog dri zhim rlung ldan pa //üîΩdka' thub can gyi bu rnams yongs 'khor rjes 'gro ba'i //
analyzed: kun nas dbugs 'byung me tog dri zhim rlung ldan pa // dka' thub can gyi bu rnams yongs 'khor rjes 'gro ba'i //
translated: The fragrant flower-wind is like a breath all around.üîΩSome of the deer, who are bound by the promise of the ascetics' sons,

original: ri dags rnams kyi myur bar dam byas 'ga' zhig tu //
analyzed: ri dags rnams kyi myur bar dam byas 'ga' zhig tu //
translated: go quickly around the ascetics' sons.üîΩThe ascetics, who have the wealth of asceticism, go to the mountain forest,

original: bzlas pas kha spu 'gul zhing mgrin pa rengs pa yi //üîΩdka' thub nor can rnams kyis ri bo tshad tshing rten //
analyzed: bzlas pas kha spu 'gul zhing mgrin pa rengs pa yi // dka' thub nor can rnams kyis ri bo tshad tshing rten //
translated: their beards shaking with recitation, their throats stiff.

original: kye ma mnyes gshin brtan pas nges par 'brel ba'i sems //
analyzed: kye ma mnyes gshin brtan pas nges par 'brel ba'i sems //
translated: Alas! The mind, which is certainly connected by affection and stability,

original: dam min bde ba myong ba'i cha dang rjes chags pas //
analyzed: dam min bde ba myong ba'i cha dang rjes chags pas //
translated: is attached to the part that experiences impure pleasure.

original: chags can shes rab med pa rnams kyi sems 'di ni //
analyzed: chags can shes rab med pa rnams kyi sems 'di ni //
translated: Will not the minds of those who are attached and lack wisdom

original: ri rtse'i sa rnams chags pa bskyed par mi 'gyur ram //
analyzed: ri rtse'i sa rnams chags pa bskyed par mi 'gyur ram //
translated: Become attached to the lands at the mountain peaks?

original: mi dge'i skye bo rnams kyis brten bya lam ngan thob nas gti mug gis //
analyzed: mi dge'i skye bo rnams kyis brten bya lam ngan thob nas gti mug gis //
translated: Having obtained the path of dependence on unwholesome people through delusion,

original: nges par mi shes pa ni mnyes gshin zhags pa ma spangs nyams par 'gyur //
analyzed: nges par mi shes pa ni mnyes gshin zhags pa ma spangs nyams par 'gyur //
translated: The one who is certain not to know will be destroyed without abandoning the noose of affection.

original: legs par byas pa rnams kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i lam yang yang dag 'dzin //
analyzed: legs par byas pa rnams kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i lam yang yang dag 'dzin //
translated: The path that follows those who have done what is right is also rightly taken.

original: gang phyir rdul bral lam ni gnas par mi 'gyur 'di ni 'dir ma thob //
analyzed: gang phyir rdul bral lam ni gnas par mi 'gyur 'di ni 'dir ma thob //
translated: Since the path free from dust will not be maintained here, it is not obtained here.

original: khyim na gnas ba'i sdug bsngal gyi skyon mang po dang ldan ba'o zhes bya bar shes nas /
analyzed: khyim na gnas ba'i sdug bsngal gyi skyon mang po dang ldan ba'o zhes bya bar shes nas /
translated: Having understood that householders have many faults of suffering,

original: zhi ba dang rjes su mthun pa rnam par grol ba'i lam gsal bar byed pa'i rab tu byung ba nyid 'di spangs nas bde ba cung zad tsam gyi phyir 'jigs pa chen po'i sdug bsngal gyi sa 'og tu zhugs pa'i phyir khyod nyid 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: zhi ba dang rjes su mthun pa rnam par grol ba'i lam gsal bar byed pa'i rab tu byung ba nyid 'di spangs nas bde ba cung zad tsam gyi phyir 'jigs pa chen po'i sdug bsngal gyi sa 'og tu zhugs pa'i phyir khyod nyid 'dod pa ste /
translated: having abandoned this very renunciation that illuminates the path of liberation that is in accord with peace, for the sake of a mere little happiness, you yourself desire to enter the ground of great fearsome suffering below.

original: gang yang khyod kyis mngon par brjod pa ni /
analyzed: gang yang khyod kyis mngon par brjod pa ni /
translated: You say that the self is the appropriator.üîΩ

original: slar yang bdag dka' thub kyi don du nags su 'ong bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni dad par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: slar yang bdag dka' thub kyi don du nags su 'ong bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni dad par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, your claim that I will come to the forest again for the sake of asceticism is not credible.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gi phyir khyim na gnas pa ni gegs mang ba ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir khyim na gnas pa ni gegs mang ba ste /

original: dbang po'i don la dbang du song ba'i 'dod can ma//
analyzed: dbang po'i don la dbang du song ba'i 'dod can ma//
translated: The lustful are not in control of their senses.

original: @19a * // mthong bar byed cing dgod pa'i sgeg pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
analyzed: @19a * // mthong bar byed cing dgod pa'i sgeg pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan //

analyzed: ma smras 'bras bu ster ba'i dka' thub can ri la //
translated: The ascetics, who give their fruits without being asked, are on the mountain.

original: gzhan yang drang srong chen po yul rnams la rjes su 'jug pa'i srog chags ni sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong ba yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang drang srong chen po yul rnams la rjes su 'jug pa'i srog chags ni sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong ba yin te /

original: ltos shing rngon pa'i glu yis ri dags ni //
analyzed: ltos shing rngon pa'i glu yis ri dags ni //
translated: The deer, who listen to the hunter's song,

original: mda' yis 'ben du khyer ba ltar //
analyzed: mda' yis 'ben du khyer ba ltar //
translated: are led to the target by the arrow.

original: yul rnams myong bar 'dod rnams kyi //
analyzed: yul rnams myong bar 'dod rnams kyi //
translated: In the same way, those who desire to experience the objects

original: rgud pa rnam nyid 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rgud pa rnam nyid 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: will only bring about their own destruction.

original: so chag pa ni nyi mar ltung ba shi bar 'gyur ba ste //
analyzed: so chag pa ni nyi mar ltung ba shi bar 'gyur ba ste //
translated: The broken-toothed one falls into the sun and dies.

original: lci ba tsha ba'i sdug bsngal nye bar nyams su myong nas ni //üîΩji ltar yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs la sems dang bcas rnams kyi //
analyzed: lci ba tsha ba'i sdug bsngal nye bar nyams su myong nas ni // ji ltar yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs la sems dang bcas rnams kyi //
translated: Having experienced the suffering of the hot hell,üîΩHow could it not be in the presence of those who are attached to suffering,

analyzed: sdug bsngal la ni chags pa rnams kyi drung du mi 'gyur ram //

analyzed: gal te mchil pa la gnas sha ni bzung bar mi 'gyur ram //
translated: If the flesh that dwells in the mouth is not grasped,

original: lus can 'di ni chu las su zhig gis ni 'don par byed //
analyzed: lus can 'di ni chu las su zhig gis ni 'don par byed //
translated: Who will deliver this body from the water?

original: bde ba la ni chags pa'i blo can mdun du rjes 'brel ba'i //
analyzed: bde ba la ni chags pa'i blo can mdun du rjes 'brel ba'i //
translated: The one with a mind attached to pleasure, following in front,

analyzed: rmongs pa'i skye bo yis ni 'jigs par rnam par mthong mi byed //
translated: The ignorant person does not see the danger.

original: zum pa'i padma la ni bung ba gnas par byed pa ste //
analyzed: zum pa'i padma la ni bung ba gnas par byed pa ste //
translated: The bee dwells in the closed lotus,

original: shin tu dri la chags pa dka' ba kun nas thob 'gyur te //
analyzed: shin tu dri la chags pa dka' ba kun nas thob 'gyur te //
translated: Completely obtaining the difficult-to-obtain attachment to scent.

original: glang po ches ni nags nas glang mo'i rjes su 'brang byed cing //
analyzed: glang po ches ni nags nas glang mo'i rjes su 'brang byed cing //
translated: The elephant follows the female elephant from the forest,

original: shin tu rno ba'i lcags kyu'i sdug bsngal chen po bzod par 'gyur //
analyzed: shin tu rno ba'i lcags kyu'i sdug bsngal chen po bzod par 'gyur //
translated: You will endure the great suffering of the very sharp iron hook.

original: chung ba'i blo can rnams ni rnam rmongs rgud pa'i rten yin la //
analyzed: chung ba'i blo can rnams ni rnam rmongs rgud pa'i rten yin la //
translated: Those with small minds are the support of confusion and decline.

original: blo brtan bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis kun nas spong ba ste //
analyzed: blo brtan bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis kun nas spong ba ste //
translated: The wise and great ones completely abandon it.

original: gal te rtag 'byung ba de la 'dod pa khyed rnams la ni yod //
analyzed: gal te rtag 'byung ba de la 'dod pa khyed rnams la ni yod //
translated: If you have a desire for that which always arises,

analyzed: de phyir dug bzhin yul gyi sbrul gyi spyod yul spong bar mdzod //
translated: then you should abandon the domain of the snake of objects, as if it were poison.

original: drang srong gis smras pa /
analyzed: drang srong gis smras pa /
translated: The sage said:

analyzed: gnod pa la sogs du ma dang skyon gyi mda' rnams kyi 'ben du gyur pa ni khyim na gnas pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúHome life is the target for the arrows of many faults, such as harm.üîΩThose whose minds are confused by the experience of a little happiness are not able to abandon it.

original: bde ba cung zad myong bas rmongs par byas pa'i bdag nyid can rnams kyis yongs su dor ba'i don du nus pa ma yin te 'on kyang /
analyzed: bde ba cung zad myong bas rmongs par byas pa'i bdag nyid can rnams kyis yongs su dor ba'i don du nus pa ma yin te 'on kyang /
translated: However,

original: shin tu snying grogs ri bong tshul khrims rgya mtsho can //
analyzed: shin tu snying grogs ri bong tshul khrims rgya mtsho can //
translated: you, O rabbit, who are a great friend, and who have an ocean of ethical discipline,

original: khyed nyid kyi ni yon tan rnams ni de lta bu //
analyzed: khyed nyid kyi ni yon tan rnams ni de lta bu //
translated: your qualities are like this.

original: bdag gi sems ni 'phro bar gang rnams kyis 'gyur ba //
analyzed: bdag gi sems ni 'phro bar gang rnams kyis 'gyur ba //
translated: But my mind is distracted by the thought: Where is he?

original: zhi ba 'dod pas slar yang 'dir ni 'ong bar byed //
analyzed: zhi ba 'dod pas slar yang 'dir ni 'ong bar byed //
translated: So I will return here, longing for peace.

original: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
translated: The Bodhisattva said:üîΩIf you must go, then stay here for this one day,

original: gal te khyod gdon mi za ba nyid du mngon par 'gro ba 'dod pa de lta na yang nyi ma gcig po 'di 'dir @19b gnas par byas te /üîΩnang par rang gi 'dod pa khyed kyis rjes su 'grub par gyis shig / de nas thub pa des 'di ltar bsams shing 'dug ste /
analyzed: gal te khyod gdon mi za ba nyid du mngon par 'gro ba 'dod pa de lta na yang nyi ma gcig po 'di 'dir @19b gnas par byas te / nang par rang gi 'dod pa khyed kyis rjes su 'grub par gyis shig / de nas thub pa des 'di ltar bsams shing 'dug ste /
translated: and tomorrow you will accomplish your desire.

original: nges par bdag la 'di spyan drang bar 'dod pa'o snyam mo //üîΩ'dzam bu'i tshal ni 'bras bu rnams kyis mngon dga' 'ga' zhig 'dis //
analyzed: nges par bdag la 'di spyan drang bar 'dod pa'o snyam mo // 'dzam bu'i tshal ni 'bras bu rnams kyis mngon dga' 'ga' zhig 'dis //
translated: Then the sage thought, He is certainly inviting me to his house.üîΩ He thought, Is he seeing some place with abundant fruit in the rose-apple garden,

original: mthong bar gyur tam 'on te ts'u ta'i shing 'dir 'bras skyes shing //
analyzed: mthong bar gyur tam 'on te ts'u ta'i shing 'dir 'bras skyes shing //
translated: or has this mango tree borne fruit?üîΩOr is it the fruit of the udumbara tree,üîΩ which is seen on some other mountain,

original: smin zhing shin tu dmar ba 'jam pa'i 'bras bu'i dri ldan pa //üîΩau dum b'a ra'i shing ngam ri gzhan 'ga' zhig tu ni mthong //
analyzed: smin zhing shin tu dmar ba 'jam pa'i 'bras bu'i dri ldan pa //üîΩau dum b'a ra'i shing ngam ri gzhan 'ga' zhig tu ni mthong //
translated: with its soft, very red, ripe fruit, fragrant with its own scent?

translated: Then, when the night was over, at dawn, the rabbit, having gone all around that forest, remained there, thinking that he had not found any roots or fruit.

original: lto stong dang ldan bkres pa dang bcas yan lag rid pa 'di //
analyzed: lto stong dang ldan bkres pa dang bcas yan lag rid pa 'di //
translated: He, who is hungry, with an empty stomach, and with thin limbs,

original: zhi ba'i thub pa bde sdug mnyam pa grogs bzang yod pa la //
analyzed: zhi ba'i thub pa bde sdug mnyam pa grogs bzang yod pa la //
translated: the Sage who is peaceful, equal in pleasure and pain, and who has good friends,

original: bdag ni rtsva sngon nags kyi nang du ji ltar za bar byed //
analyzed: bdag ni rtsva sngon nags kyi nang du ji ltar za bar byed //
translated: how can I eat grass in the forest?

original: bsil bar dri ma med pa'i chu ni ji ltar btung bar bgyi //
analyzed: bsil bar dri ma med pa'i chu ni ji ltar btung bar bgyi //
translated: How can I drink cool, clear water?

original: yang na don du gnyer ba'i skye bo re bsgrub par byed nus pa'i lus 'di yod pa la bdag nus pa med pa dang 'dra bar yid mi bde bas ci'i phyir gnas par byed //

translated: Or, this body, which is able to fulfill the hopes of those who seek it, is like me, who am powerless. Why should I remain here, unhappy?

original: de nas drang srong de'i drung du song nas smras pa //
analyzed: de nas drang srong de'i drung du song nas smras pa //
translated: Then, he went to the sage and said:

original: drang srong chen po re zhig yud tsam bzhugs shig ji srid bdag gis kha zas kyi tshogs cung zad dbul bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: drang srong chen po re zhig yud tsam bzhugs shig ji srid bdag gis kha zas kyi tshogs cung zad dbul bar bgyi'o //
translated: ‚ÄúGreat sage, please wait a moment while I offer you a small amount of food.‚Äù

original: de nas thub pa de 'di ltar ldum gyi rtsa ba dang 'bras bu kun nas zad pa'i nags 'dir slar kha zas nye bar sdud pa'i nus pa ji lta bu 'di la yod par 'gyur snyam du bsams so //

translated: Then he thought, ‚ÄúHow is it that this sage, in this forest where the roots and fruits of the grove have been completely exhausted, has the ability to gather food again?‚Äù

analyzed: de nas bdag nyid chen po des sol ba'i phung po 'bar bar mthong nas smon lam 'di ltar mngon par 'phel zhing 'dug go //
translated: Then the great being, seeing the burning pile of charcoal, made this aspiration:

analyzed: ji ltar don gnyer bkres pa zhi phyir sdug bsngal dang bral ba //
translated: ‚ÄúJust as I, for the sake of relieving the suffering of hunger of those in need,

original: bdag gis sreg blugs za ba 'bar zhing 'khrungs la srog rnams dor //
analyzed: bdag gis sreg blugs za ba 'bar zhing 'khrungs la srog rnams dor //

original: de ltar 'gro ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa ni //
analyzed: de ltar 'gro ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa ni //
translated: in the same way, may I remove the suffering of beings

original: shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'i stobs bcu nyid ni thob par bgyi //
analyzed: shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'i stobs bcu nyid ni thob par bgyi //
translated: and attain the state of the ten powers, which is so difficult to attain.‚Äù

original: gzhan gyi don la rang gi bdag nyid dor ba rab tu dga' ba'i yid des de ltar bsam byas nas //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don la rang gi bdag nyid dor ba rab tu dga' ba'i yid des de ltar bsam byas nas //

analyzed: nyon mongs bcas par bya phyir zhi ba'i go 'phang mngon par 'dod cing srog chags rnams kyi gnyen du ni //
translated: he desired the state of peace for the sake of the afflicted, and became a friend to living beings.

original: nags kyi me de rnams kyang 'bar ba'i @20a * //
analyzed: nags kyi me de rnams kyang 'bar ba'i @20a * //
translated: The forest fire,

original: tshogs ni nye bar zhi gyur de yi bsod nams mthu yis te //
analyzed: tshogs ni nye bar zhi gyur de yi bsod nams mthu yis te //
translated: was extinguished by the power of his merit.

original: sgeg pa'i chu rlabs ri mo can dang rab bskyod bung ba'i tshogs ldan padma'i 'byung gnas nyid du gyur //
analyzed: sgeg pa'i chu rlabs ri mo can dang rab bskyod bung ba'i tshogs ldan padma'i 'byung gnas nyid du gyur //

analyzed: de nas thub pa des sdug go zhes brjod nas me zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chus gang ba'i spyi blugs bzung ste /

analyzed: ri bong des ni shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa ni //

original: chu nang padma dkar po des ni mdzes par gyur //
analyzed: chu nang padma dkar po des ni mdzes par gyur //
translated: The white lotus in the water has been made beautiful by him.

original: ston dus gsal ba'i nam mkha' la ni rab gsal ba //
analyzed: ston dus gsal ba'i nam mkha' la ni rab gsal ba //
translated: In the autumn sky, clear and bright,

original: ri bong gis mtshan gzugs ni gsal bas mtshan pa ltar //
analyzed: ri bong gis mtshan gzugs ni gsal bas mtshan pa ltar //
translated: the hare is marked by the clear sign of his form.

analyzed: de nas padma dkar po'i nang du gnas pa'i ri bong de mthong nas thub pa de ngo mtshar ba'i yid dang ldan pas bstod pa 'di rab tu smra bar gyur to //
translated: Then, seeing the hare dwelling in the white lotus, the sage, with a mind full of wonder, uttered this praise:

analyzed: ae ma gzhan gyi don ni sgrub pas bkra shis pa //
translated: ‚ÄúAh! How auspicious is the accomplishment of the welfare of others!

analyzed: grags pa'i gter khyod kyi ni phrin las 'di ngo mtshar //

analyzed: bsam byas bdag nyid chen po'i khyad par yang dag bsten //
translated: You have perfectly relied on the special greatness of mind.

analyzed: blo gros chen po su dag ri bong ltar khyed spyod // rlung gis kha lo sgyur ba rab 'bar 'di gang du //
translated: O great-minded one, who practices like the hare,üîΩwhere is this wind that blows, and where is this fire that blazes?

original: padma'i nags tshal nyid ni 'di 'dra gang du yang //
analyzed: padma'i nags tshal nyid ni 'di 'dra gang du yang //
translated: Where is this lotus grove like this?

original: bdag nyid chen po rnams kyi bsod nams stobs kyis ni //
analyzed: bdag nyid chen po rnams kyi bsod nams stobs kyis ni //
translated: By the power of the merit of the great ones,

analyzed: byin gyis brlabs pas dug shing 'di yang sman shing 'gyur //

analyzed: de nas bdag nyid chen po de padma dkar po las babs nas thub pa de dang lhan cig tu shing lo las byas pa'i khang par zhugs te //
translated: Then the great being descended from the white lotus and entered the hut made of leaves together with the sage.

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i mdzad pa shes pas ngo mtshar ba'i yid dang ldan pa'i lha'i dbang pos kun nas mig sman gyi ri bo ltar sngo ba'i chu 'dzin gyi tshogs kyis nyin mor byed pa bsgribs pas yun ring po ma yin pa'i 'od kyi gsal bas kun nas
translated: The lord of the gods, with a mind of wonder knowing the deeds of the bodhisattva, made the sky clear with a multitude of clouds blue like a mountain of collyrium, not long after obscuring the sun with its bright light,

analyzed: dmar ba'i phyogs kyi bar dang ldan pa'i nam mkha'i mthongs byas so //

analyzed: de nas rab tu bskyod byas chu yis bsil ba'i rlung rnams ni //
translated: Then the winds cooled by the water stirred up

analyzed: kun nas shing los byas pa'i khang pa byed cing rgyu bar 'gyur //
translated: will blow all around, making the hut of leaves.

analyzed: ri bong lhan cig byed pa'i shing la ne tso rnams brten pa //
translated: Parrots perched in the trees that grew with the rabbits.

analyzed: yang dag 'byung ba'i phred can 'bras bu dang bcas rnam mdzes gyur //
translated: The creepers, with their proper growth, were beautiful with their fruit.

analyzed: bung ba'i gling bu rnams kyi sgra ni kun nas 'byung ba dang // @20b chu yi ri ni 'bab chu dang bcas rdza rnga bzhin du sgra sgrogs dus //
translated: The sound of the bees‚Äô flutes arose on all sides, and the water mountain, with its waterfalls, resounded like a drum.

original: ri yi steng du gnas pa'i rma bya dang 'bral nam mkha' la //
analyzed: ri yi steng du gnas pa'i rma bya dang 'bral nam mkha' la //
translated: The peacocks, who lived on the mountain, were separated from the sky,

original: sprin ni sad pa rnam par ldang bar byed cing gar byed 'gyur //
analyzed: sprin ni sad pa rnam par ldang bar byed cing gar byed 'gyur //
translated: and the clouds, rising from the heat, danced in the sky.

original: lha dbang yid ni 'phrog par byed pa'i gzhung ni rgyas byas nas //
analyzed: lha dbang yid ni 'phrog par byed pa'i gzhung ni rgyas byas nas //
translated: Having made the text, which ravishes the mind of the lord of the gods, extensive,

analyzed: gang zhig mang ba bsil ba'i char chu 'bab par byas pa ni //
translated: he, who made the rain of the cool water fall in abundance,

analyzed: chu 'dzin rnams ni so ga rnam par ldang bar zad byas pa //
translated: having made the clouds rise in the spring,

analyzed: spro zhing yun mi ring ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis rnam par rgyas //
translated: was swollen by the rays, which were not long in appearing.

original: kun nas 'khor ba'i bung ba nges par ltung bas khros pa ni //
analyzed: kun nas 'khor ba'i bung ba nges par ltung bas khros pa ni //
